chat.expression:
{
  classes: 'ccm-chat',
  html: [ 'ccm.store', 'https://akless.github.io/ccm-developer/resources/chat/templates.json' ],
  style: [ 'ccm.load', 'https://akless.github.io/ccm-developer/resources/chat/style.css' ],
  'data.store': [ 'ccm.store', { url: 'ws://ccm2.inf.h-brs.de', store: 'chat' } ],
  'data.key': 'test',
  user: [ 'ccm.instance', 'https://kaul.inf.h-brs.de/ccm/components/user2.js' ]
}

quizz.expression:
{
  classes: 'ccm-quizz',
  html: [ 'ccm.store', '../quizz/templates.json' ],
  style: [ 'ccm.load', '../quizz/layout.css' ],
  'data.store': [ 'ccm.store', '../quizz/datastore.json' ],
  'data.key': 'demo',
  onFinish: function ( result ) { result.quizz.render(); },
  'text.answer': 'Answer',
  'text.correct': 'Correct solution',
  'text.finish': 'Finish',
  'text.next': 'Next',
  'text.question': 'Question',
  'text.result': 'Result'
}
